definition: a restraint that confines or restricts freedom (especially something used to tie down or restrain a prisoner), place limits on (extent or access)
details:
noun
- a restraint that confines or restricts freedom (especially something used to tie down or restrain a prisoner)
= synonyms: bond
- a restraint that is used to teach a horse to amble
- an adjustable pothook set in a fireplace
- a fishing net with three layers
= synonyms: trammel net
verb
- place limits on (extent or access)
= synonyms: bound
- catch in or as if in a trap
= synonyms: trap
